|wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Atheros |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.0.228 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui= |oui_eth= }} "490ADS00E-1.6MM" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
Default settings are per the FCC manual..
